name: After September
description:
In After September, you play as Nora, a depressed college student at a turning point in her life. Explore her apartment, meet her friends, and embark on a strange therapy treatment in hopes to return to college and the everyday world-- all while managing your "spoons."

CONTROLS:

Up/Down arrow keys: Move

Left/Right arrow keys: Turn

R + Mouse Scroll: Navigate Room

Hold Esc: Unlock Cursor

This game is made with Yarn Spinner. To download Yarn Spinner and use it in your projects, visit: https://github.com/thesecretlab/YarnSpinner 

FONT USED:

https://www.fontspace.com/savanasdesign/chisel-mark
